items.sentence: These headaches of mine are getting worse and worse.
Are you quite certain it was Tom you saw doing that?
Tom stopped at a convenience store to buy some milk.
Tom surprised Mary by bringing her breakfast in bed.
Tom switched off all the lights and lit the candles.
Tom and Mary borrowed money from family and friends.
Tom and Mary have been friends since they were kids.
I want someone to tell me why Tom isn\'t here today.
Tom is the only Canadian that I invited to my party.
Tom is the only one here who knows where Mary lives.
